top.title: Sperm from donor with cancer-causing gene was used to conceive almost 200 children
top.summary: Some children have already died and only a minority who inherit the mutation will escape cancer in their lifetimes.

top.title: US could ask foreign tourists for five-year social media history before entry
top.summary: The plan would affect people from countries, including the UK, which can fill out a form in lieu of a visa.

top.title: Nobel Peace Prize winner will be in Oslo but won't make awards ceremony
top.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, who lives in hiding, is reportedly safe and on her way to Oslo.

top.title: McDonald's pulls AI Christmas ad after backlash
top.summary: McDonald's said the moment served as "an important learning" as it explored "the effective use of AI".

top.title: People spending even more time online now than during the pandemic
top.summary: The survey found people in the UK spent on average four hours and 30 minutes online every day in 2025

top.title: Kids locked out of social media apps after Australia's world-first ban
top.summary: The new law requires tech platforms to ensure that Australians aged under 16 don't hold accounts.
